text: The women's 1500 metres at the 2017 Asian Winter Games was held on February 21, 2017 in Obihiro, Japan. ==Schedule== All times are Japan Standard Time (UTC+09:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | Tuesday, 21 February 2017 || 13:00 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} == Records == ==Results== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=40|Rank !width=40|Pair !width=250|Athlete !width=80|Time !width=50|Notes |- | || 7 || align=left| || 1:56.07|| |- |||8||align=left|||1:58.13|| |- |3||5||align=left|||1:59.45|| |- |4||4||align=left|||1:59.77|| |- |||9||align=left|||2:00.14|| |- |6||7||align=left|||2:01.26|| |- |7||6||align=left|||2:01.69|| |- |8||9||align=left|||2:01.76|| |- |9||4||align=left|||2:01.78|| |- |10||5||align=left|||2:01.83|| |- |11||3||align=left|||2:02.37|| |- |12||8||align=left|||2:03.67|| |- |13||6||align=left|||2:06.73|| |- |14||2||align=left|||2:08.74|| |- |15||3||align=left|||2:14.61|| |- |16||2||align=left|||2:18.25|| |- |17||1||align=left|||2:42.48|| |} * Zhang Hong was awarded bronze because of no three-medal sweep per country rule. ==References== ==External links== *Results Women 1500
title: Speed skating at the 2017 Asian Winter Games – Women's 1500 metres
